creator: ramforj@gmail.com
text:
Currently the ignoreTCL option is only read as a system property.  This does not allow for the option to be "embedded" within a deployable application (e.g. EAR, JAR, WAR files), and thus adds a step to deployment of applications requiring the option be set.

I am suggesting the ignoreTCL option be enhanced such that it can be read from the corresponding log4jconfig.xml or log4j.properties files.
